text: Ertuğrul Bey'ime söyle, beni bulsun O nerede olduğumu bilir
english: Tell Mr. Ertugrul to find me. He'll know where I am.

text: Banı Çiçek'le Selcan Hatun hayatlarını ortaya koyarak
english: By putting together the lives of Mr. Flower and Selcan Hatun

text: Ertuğrul Bey'imin oyununa düşen Aytolun da oradaydı
english: Aytol, who fell for Mr. Ertugrul's play, was there.
All he cared about was killing them.

text: Anamla babamı öldürdüğünü kendi ağzından işittim
english: I heard from his own mouth that he killed my parents.

text: Uç beyliğin hayırlı uğurlu olsun Gümüştekin Bey’im
english: Good luck to you, Master of Silver.
How could you let this happen, Aytolun?
What do you mean you had to?
Why didn't you tell the Alps?

text: Banı Çiçek, Selcan’a cinayetleri bizim işlediğimizi ispat edecek…
english: Bani Cicek will prove that we committed the Selcana murders...
...he was going to give evidence, Dad.

text: Ertuğrul Bey, Halime Sultan’ı keferenin elinden kurtarmazdan çok önce…
english: Mr. Ertugrul, long before he saved Halima Sultan from the shroud...
Ertuğrul was in the heart of Gökçe.

text: Senin ağzından çıkanı kulağın işitir mi?
english: Do you hear what you're saying?
I'd rather rot my tongue than say that to you.
I used to call it all childhood.

text: Lakin Halime Sultan’la evlendikten sonra da Gökçe içindeki ateşi söküp atamamış…
english: But Halima didn't get rid of the fire in Gökçe after she was married to Sultan.
...but he still wanted to marry you, son.
Tugtekin Bey, who caught fire from the spark

text: avradının eski gönül meselelerini ciddiye almadı demek ki
english: He didn't take the old heart issues seriously.

text: Benim aklım da buna ermez ağabey
english: I don't know about that either, brother.

text: Tuğtekin çoktan hançerini Ertuğrul'un gırtlağına dayamalıydı
english: Tugtekin should have pressed his dagger against Ertugrul's throat by now.
Tuğtekin and Gündüz are aware of everything.

text: Dün gece Doğan Alp'i götürüp adaleti sağlayacağımı söylediğimde
english: When I told you last night I'd take the Born Alps and get justice
If Tugtekin found out the truth
Do you have a sign, Mr. Silver?
Mr. Ertuğrul has left the oba

text: O vakit gidip katillerin cezasını keselim
english: Then let's go pay for the killers.

text: Daha ne kadar olanlara göz yumacağız?
english: How much longer do we have to let this happen?

text: Gündoğdu'nun çıbanı için mantar toplamaya çıkmış tek başına
english: He went out alone to pick mushrooms for the sun's boil.

text: Görürüm ki Gündoğdu'nun derdi bize derman olacak
english: I'll see that Gündüz's trouble will be upon us.
Master of the Silver that you have been commanded to do

text: Ağzından çıkanı kulağın duyar mı senin?
Devletin ve Sultan Alaeddin'in bir hizmetkârı olarak bunu bilir
english: As a servant of the state and Sultan Alaeddin, he knows that.

text: Devletimizin uç beyini nasıl olur da hain diye yaftalarsın?
english: How could you label our state's ultimate brain as a traitor?
It's the end of you. The silver one.

text: Anamla babamın diyetini ödemeden nereye Gümüştekin?
english: Where's Silver without paying for my parents' diet?

text: Anamla babamın diyetini ödemeden nereye Gümüştekin?
english: Where's Silver without paying for my parents' diet?
What do you think, Mr. Tugtekin?

text: Babanın katilini bulmak için canımı tehlikeye attığımı görmez misin?
english: Can't you see I risked my life to find your father's killer?
Don't forget I'm the master of flight.

text: Selcan'ın gizli gizli Banı Çiçek'le buluştuğunu öğrendik Hayme Hatun
english: We found out Selcan was secretly meeting with Bani Flower Hayme Hatun
I told you to let go of my daughter-in-law.

text: Halime Sultan'ın boynundan o kılıcını da çek
english: Take that sword away from Halima Sultan's neck.
Then say what you have to say.

text: Dodurga Alplerini toplayıp buraya getirsin hemen
english: Have him round up the Doduga Alps and bring them here right away.

text: oğullarım ve gelinlerimle Korkut Bey'i öldürdüğümü mü düşünürsün?
english: You think I killed Mr. Scare with my sons and daughters-in-law?
I don't know if I can trust you.

text: Her şey senin o kopasıca başının altından çıkabilir mi?
english: Can everything come out of your own fucking head?
I don't know who else he'd poison, but

text: senin o dilini kopartacağımı söylemiştim sana
english: I told you I'd cut your tongue out.
I'm not gonna die until I rip your tongue out.

text: Madem gelinlerim de bu ihanetin içindeyse
english: If my daughters-in-law is involved in this betrayal
Why did you wear your strollers and come alone?

text: Korkut Bey'in adaletini kendin mi vermek istersin?
english: Do you want to give Mr. Scare's justice yourself?
Just like the silver one went after Ertugrul
Just like he wanted to bring his own justice

text: Sen bunu nereden bilirsin be kadın?
english: How the hell would you know that, woman?
I know you killed Mr. Scare.
You did it by order of the Dog.

text: otağımdaki Sungur Tekin'e Sultan Alaeddin tarafından verilmiş mührü
english: The seal given to Sungur Tekin in my bed by Sultan Alaeddin
That you stole it, and then you took it to the dog.

text: o Köpek'in de mührü Tangut'a verdiğini de bilirim
english: I also know that Dog gave the seal to Tangut.

text: Yoksa ne kadar adi mahluklar olduğunuzu
english: Or else you'll know what a vile creature you are
Are you afraid they'll find out?
You don't know what you're talking about.
I said don't come any closer.

text: Yoksa torunun da, gelinin de ölür
english: Or your grandson and daughter-in-law will die.
He thinks he's setting a trap in silver

text: Lakin asıl Gümüştekin evlatlarımın tuzağına düşecek
english: But your true silver will fall into the trap of my children

text: Ertuğrul ve Tuğtekin onu yakalamak için gittiler
english: Ertugrul and Tuğtekin went to catch him.
None of them can afford my father.

text: Bunca senedir sizin gibi soysuzlarla savaştayız
english: We've been at war with degenerates like you all these years.
If you only knew what we could afford

text: Kızım, bunların yalanlarına sen de kanar mısın?
english: Girl, would you fall for their lies?
You're a lot of bad luck.
You won't be able to afford us Hayme

text: Bugün otağında kim varsa hepsi ölecek
english: Whoever's in your tent today, they're all gonna die.

text: Onun kanı sana ananın ak sütü gibi helaldir
english: His blood is lawful to you like your mother's white milk.
But don't let your anger get the best of you.

text: Adaletini Türkmen obalarına göster Tuğtekin Bey
english: Show your justice to Turkmen obas Mr. Tuğtekin

text: Ve o Saadettin Köpek alçağına da göster
english: And that Saadettin Show that dog bastard

text: Göster ki haklıyken devletin karşısında haksız duruma düşmeyin
english: Show that when you're right, don't be wronged in front of the government.

text: Bunun ölümü bu kadar kolay olmayacak
english: It won't be so easy for him to die.

text: Otağımda iki obanın beylerinin önünde yargılanacaksın
english: You'll be tried in front of the gentlemen of two obans in my tent.

text: Ahalinin önünde utanç içinde infaz edileceksin Gümüştekin
english: You will be executed in shame in front of your people.

text: Herkes sizin nasıl bir soysuz olduğunuzu görecek
english: Everyone will see what a degenerate you are.
Neither your brother nor your daughter

text: Benim, benim kim olduğumu bilmez misin?
english: Don't you know who I am?

text: babamın da katili olduğunu bilirim Gümüştekin
english: I know my father is the murderer of the silver
You'll be treated the way you deserve

text: Ben yanınızda oldukça kimse size ilişemez
english: No one can touch you as long as I'm with you.
If you want to get rid of me, take me hostage.
Then you can do whatever you want.

text: Siz öldükten sonra gerçeği kimse öğrenemeyecek
english: After you're dead, no one will ever know the truth.
Hayme Ana, are you all right?
What kind of a snake are you?
You've come in and nested in our bosoms.

text: Onca masum insanın canına nasıl kıydınız siz?
english: How did you kill all those innocent people?
It's all, it's all Ertugrul's trap Tugtekin
How did you hurt these people?
You're gonna pay for all this.

text: Halime yalvarırım aç gözlerini Yalvarırım aç
english: I beg you, open your eyes, open your eyes.
Go to the office right now, call for help.
We've got to get Halima to the Oba.
I have no fear of death.

text: Zalime zalimlikle mukabele etmekle kimse abat olmaz
english: No one's strong enough to deal with cruel cruelty.

text: Bırak hak ettiği ölümü kendi obasında
english: Let him die in his own room
In shame let him be in front of his people.

text: Ya önüme düşer mahkemenin babanla sana vereceği cezaya razı gelirsin
english: Either you step in front of me and settle for the court's punishment with your father.
Or you'll be dead from here.

text: Çabuk, çabuk obaya haber verin, yardım getirsinler
english: Hurry, hurry, tell the oba to get help.
Hurry up and get some help.
Hurry up and get a gurney.

text: Duru yengem gibi kolay lokma olmayacağım size
english: I'm not going to be easy on you like my sister-in-law.

text: Can almak kolay mıymış göster bakalım
english: Show me how easy it is to take a life.
As much as saying you love me
Show me how easy it is to take a life!
I was gonna give him the babies you couldn't give him.
May your love sink to the ground
You will die here by my hand.
Or it's in the hands of Gündüz in the Obada.

text: Allah'ım oğluma bu acıyı yaşatma yarabbim
english: Oh, God, don't put my son through this pain.

text: Alpler birazdan burada olur Hayme Ana'm
english: The Alps will be here soon, my Hayme Mother.
I beg you to open your eyes

text: Gebermeden evvel bir şey daha bilmen gerekiyor Goncagül
english: One more thing you need to know before you die, Goncagül.
I carry the son of my sunshine in my belly
If you're all right, I'm going after him.
These are the mushrooms that will cure my sunshine.

text: Aytolun ve Goncagül Hatun, Halime Sultan'ın canına kastetmiş derler
english: Aytolun and Goncagül Hatun have claimed Sultan Halima's life.

text: İkisini de obadan çıkarken gördüm ben
english: I saw them both coming out of the room.

text: Demek bunun için hızlı hızlı giderlerdi
english: That's why they'd go so fast.
They were in cahoots with Silverkin.
The Alps went to fetch Halima Sultan.
Turns out they're the ones who caused the catacombs.

text: Lakin Gündoğdu'mun derdine derman olmaya vesile olan
english: But it's a cure for my sunup's troubles.

text: Ben mantarları buldum, o da belasını bulacak
english: I found the mushrooms, and he's gonna get his ass kicked.
She ran away like a dove Hayme Ana
Say Aytolun's prayer and bury him now
I don't want my Oba to get any more dirty.

text: Obaya dönünce yirmi, yirmi beş Alp'e vazife ver
english: When you get back to Oba, give twenty, twenty-five to the Alps.
There's no time to lose, Mr. Tugtekin.
We need to get back to the office and set up a trial.

text: Her iki obanın da beyleri hakikati görmeli
english: The gentlemen of both obans must see the truth.

text: Gümüştekin'in uç beyliğini de tanıyan Türkmen obaları da
english: Turkmen obas who recognize Silver's capacities
He must stand behind the court's decision

text: Aksi halde sadece Emir Saadettin'i değil
english: Otherwise, it's not just Emir Saadettin.

text: Türkmen obalarını da karşımıza almış oluruz
english: We'll be taking on the Turkmen Obas as well.
Wake that dog up. We're leaving.

Wakey, wakey, wakey, wakey, wakey, wakey, wakey, wakey, wakey, wakey, wakey, wakey, wakey, wakey, wakey, wakey, wakey, wakey, wakey, wakey, wakey, wakey, wakey, wakey, wakey, wakey, wakey, wakey, wakey, wakey, wakey, wakey, wakey, wakey, wakey, wakey, wakey, wakey, wakey, wakey, wakey, wakey, wakey, wakey, wakey, wakey, wakey, wakey, wakey, wakey, wakey, wakey, wakey, wakey, wakey, wakey, wakey.
It's time to settle the score.

text: O soysuz kelleni obanın ortasında yuvarlanırken görür gibiyim
english: I can see your degenerate head rolling in the middle of the obama.
That's not what your beady eyes say.
He's scared out of his mind.
Don't you ever get ahead of us.

text: de o devrilesice boyunu bir görelim
english: Let's see how tall he is.
That's the bastard if he doesn't talk.

text: Emir Saadettin ile olan bağını ispatlayamayız
english: We can't prove his connection to Emir Saadettin.

text: Emir Saadettin'i diz çöktürmeye ihtiyacımız var
english: We need to bring Emir Saadettin to his knees.

text: O gün de er ya da geç gelecek
english: That day will come sooner or later
I'll be your sacrifice, my lord.
You stay here with Selcan Hatun.

text: Bu ilacın tamamını Gündoğdu Bey'ime içiresin
english: Make my Mr. Gündü drink all this medicine
El Shafi face, for the sake of water

text: beyimin tek devası bu mantarlardır Selcan Hatun
english: My master's only giant is these mushrooms Selcan Hatun
I hope he'll be all right.
May the good Lord heal him.
Everything is from God. Selcan Hatun.
I beg you, hold on, Halima.

text: Sen de beben de iyi olacaksınız
english: You'll be fine, and I'll be fine.
We're here, Halima, I beg you. Hold on.
Take it easy, don't shake it.

text: Selcan Hatun şifasıyla tam vaktiyle yetişmiştir Hayme Hatun
english: Selcan Hatun has grown up just in time for her healing, Hayme Hatun.
I hope he'll be all right.
Killer, you're going to pay for this.
Kill him, kill him, for God's sake.
Give us our lord's murderer, my lord.

text: Bundan gayri aldığınız her nefese lanet edeceksiniz
english: You'll curse every breath you take out of it.
Even if you kill me, the Emir is Saadettin's.
You won't be able to get rid of his anger.
♪ I'm the brains of the sky ♪
From the anger of Emir Saadettin

text: Daha dün bir uç beyi olarak karşılanırdın bu obada
english: Yesterday, you would have been welcomed as a flymaster on this Obada.

text: Şimdi de sefil bir it olarak karşılanırsın
english: And now you'll be welcomed as a miserable bastard.

text: Sahibin de er ya da geç bu kutlu günden nasibini alacak. Merak etmeyesin
english: Sooner or later, your master will get his share of this blessed day.

text: Lakin bulunup getirildiğinde hak ettiği ceza verilecektir
english: But when he is found and brought back, he will be requited for his deeds.

text: iki obanın beylerinin mahkeme kurup bu iti yargılamasını isterim
english: I'd like the gentlemen of the two obans to stand trial and judge this bastard.

text: Adaletin yerine gelmesi için ne gerekirse yapılacaktır Tuğtekin Bey'im
english: Whatever it takes to get justice done, Mr. Tugtekin.
Today is the day of justice.

text: Etimize yapışan bir ur gibi nice vakittir bu katilleri içimizde taşıdık
english: How many times have we carried these killers in our midst, like a plant that clings to our flesh?
With the blood they shed as a cure

text: kendimizi yuğduk Bu katilleri otağımıza aldık
english: We've got ourselves down We've got these killers on board

text: Toyumuza aldık Ağabey, kardeş, ana belledik
english: We've got him, brother, brother, we've got him, we've got him, we've got him, we've got him, we've got him, we've got him, we've got him, we've got him, we've got him, we've got him, we've got him, we've got him, we've got him, we've got him, we've got him, we've got him, we've got him, we've got him, we've got him, we've got him, we've got him, we've got him, we've got him, we've got him, we've got him, we've got him, we've got him, we've got him, we've got him, we've got him, we've got him, we've got him, we've got him, we've got him, we've got him, we've got him, we've got him, we've got him, we've got him, we've got him, we've got him, we've got him, we've got him, we've got him

text: Şimdi vakit, bu uru kesip atma vaktidir
english: Now, it's time to cut this up.
I know, this wound won't go away

text: Bizler ölene dek bu yarayı içimizde taşıyacağız
english: We will carry this wound inside us until we die.
♪ We'll carry it with an example ♪
Let's never face such shame again.
He tried to rebel against the government.
The sentence will be a public lesson.

text: Devlete isyan edenin kanının helal olduğunu
english: That the blood of those who rebel against the state is lawful
Even if you ask for forgiveness

text: Turgut, yargı başlayana kadar Gümüştekin'i kafesli çadıra götürün
english: Turgut, take Silverkin to the caged tent until the trial begins.
They tried to kill Selcan and Halima.

text: bir darbe aldı Artuk Bey yanında
english: He took a hit. He's with Artuk Bey.

text: Halime Sultan da evladı da çok iyidir maşallah
english: Halima Sultan and his son are very good.

text: Gir elbet. Halime Sultan da dört gözle seni bekler
english: Halima Sultan is looking forward to it.

text: Çok şükür sen de iyisin Halime Sultan
english: Thank God you're all right, Halima Sultan.

text: Çok korktum Ertuğrul Onu koruyamamaktan çok korktum
english: I was so scared that I couldn't protect him.

text: Allah'ın verdiği canı Allah alır Halime Sultan
english: God will take the life of God, Sultan Halima.

text: Evladımız da ben de bir ömür boyu seninle gurur duyacağız
english: Our child and I will be proud of you for the rest of our lives.

text: Bırakın beni! Bırakın! Bırakın! Ben sizin uç beyinizim
english: Let me go! Let me go! Let me go!
You can't do this to me.

text: Allah insana yaşarken de cehennem azabı verir derlerdi de
english: And they used to say, "Allah will punish man while he lives."
I saw it with my own eyes.

text: Hem senin hem babamın canına kıyan hainler bulundu ana
english: Mother, the traitors who killed both you and my father have been found.
The doubles, the trials are finally over.

text: Şükür ki içine düştüğüm gafletten sonunda kurtuldum
english: Thankfully, I'm finally free from the error of my ways.

text: Bundan böyle hem sana hem obama yaraşır bir bey olacağım
english: From now on, I'll be a gentleman worthy of both you and my obama.

text: Hainler, zalimler, kansızlar bundan böyle Allah'ın izniyle obamızdan ırak olacak
english: The betrayers, the wrongdoers, and the deprived will be far away from us by Allah's leave.

text: Dodurga'ya yakışır bir bey olduğunu ispatladın
english: You've proven yourself a gentleman worthy of Doduga.

text: Gayrı rahat olasın. Anan da baban da huzur içindedir
english: Be at ease, your parents are at peace.

text: Gayrı diri diri mezara koymayasın beni
english: Don't put me in the grave alive
How can I trust you, Gökçe?
I believed you, I loved you.

text: Beni otağıma diri diri gömdüğünü görmez misin?
english: Can't you see he buried me alive in my tent?
He'll stand up straight, I hope.

text: Aytolun öldü. Lakin Goncagül kaçtı ağabey
english: Aytolun is dead, but Goncagül has escaped.

text: O soysuz da belasını bulacak beyim
english: That bastard's gonna get his ass kicked, too, mister.
As long as I have brave brothers and sisters like you
As long as I've gone Selcan-like
Apricots don't fall on their backs.

text: Artuk Bey istirahat etmesi gerektiğini söyledi
english: Mr. Artuk says he needs to rest.
My sunrise will be fine, don't worry.

text: Gidip o soysuza hak ettiğini verin
english: Go give that bastard what he deserves.

text: Allah sizden razı olsun Dodurga'yı bu beladan da kurtardınız
english: God bless you, you've saved Dodurga from this trouble.
My other Obama is at peace
What did we do, Flower Chick?

text: Asıl sen olmasaydın daha nice kan dökülecekti
english: If it weren't for you, there'd be a lot more bloodshed.
Maybe the truth won't come out.

text: Bir derdin olursa nerede olduğumu bilirsin
english: If you have any problems, you know where I am.

text: Ya vakti gelip obalarımız ayrı yerlere göç ettiğinde?
english: What if it's time for our obas to move to separate locations?
Then where will I find you?
Always know that it's in my heart

text: Moğol belasından ve sefaletten beli bükülen Türkmen obaları
english: Turkmen obamas bent from Mongol plague and misery

text: Gümüştekin ve Köpek'in avuçlarında iyice ezilecekti
english: He'd be crushed by the silver and the dog's palms.

text: Bu mahkemeyi ve mahkemenin akıbetini öğrenen Türkmen beyleri
english: Türkmen gentlemen who have learned of this court and the outcome of the court

text: nasıl bir beladan kurtulduklarını anlayacak ve bize hak vereceklerdir
english: They'll know what trouble they're getting out of and they'll agree with us.

text: Mahkeme sonrası Saadettin Köpek azgın bir mahluk gibi üzerimize gelecek
english: After the trial, the dog will come at us like a raging beast.

text: İşte o vakit Türkmen beylerinin desteği bizim için çok mühim olacaktır
english: Then the support of the Turkmen gentlemen will be very important to us.

text: Mahkememizin adaleti aşikar olmuş hıyaneti bir bıçak gibi kesecektir
english: The justice of our court will cut treason as if it were a knife.

text: Tuğtekin Bey de uygun görürse toy mahkemesinin başında sen olasın isterim
english: If Mr. Tugtekin agrees, I'd like you to be in charge of the juvenile court.

text: Hayme Ana doğru der Öfkem, adaletime mani olur
english: Hayme says it's true My anger prevents my justice

text: Sizler münasip gördüyseniz bana da vazifenin gereğini yapmak düşer
english: If you think it's appropriate, it's up to me to do my duty.

text: O itin kellesini ben almak istemem
english: I don't want to take that son of a bitch's head.

text: Eğer Ertuğrul Bey beni bu gaflet uykusundan uyandırmasaydı
english: If Mr. Ertugrul hadn't woken me from this stupid sleep

text: dizginlerim hâlâ o itin elinde olacaktı
english: I still had my reins in that dog's hand.
They were going to ride in my bow, in my bow.

text: Gümüştekin'in kellesini almak Ertuğrul Bey'e düşer
english: It's up to Mr. Ertugrul to take Silver's head.

text: Tuğtekin Bey, Gümüştekin'in kellesi sana helaldir
english: Mr. Tugtekin, the head of Silverkin is lawful to you.

text: O it, kem ruhunu teslim ederken
english: While that Mutt delivers his evil spirit

text: gözlerinin içine bakıp cehennem ateşini yüreğine salmak isterim
english: I'd like to look you in the eye and unleash the fire of hell into your heart.

text: Emir Hazretleri, Ertuğrul uç beyimizi esir edip
english: Your Highness, Ertugrul will capture our fly master
He took me to the oba.

text: Tuğtekin Bey ve Sungur Tekin bir olup askerlerimle beni derdest ettiler
english: Tuğtekin Bey and Sungur Tekin are one and they've made trouble with my soldiers.

text: Evet Emir Hazretleri. Üçü bir olmuşlardı Gümüştekin Bey'imizin de
english: Yes, Your Highness, the three of them were one and so was Mr. Silver.
They said you were a traitor, too.

text: Demek sonunda devlete isyan ettiler ha?
english: So they finally rebelled against the government, huh?
Gather your troops, we're going to the Abyssian Obama.

text: Korkut Bey'le kan bağım olmadığı için
english: Since I'm not related to Mr. Scare

text: iki obanın beyleri beni mahkemenin başına getirdiler Gümüştekin Bey
english: The gentlemen of the two obans brought me to the head of the court, Mr. Silver.

text: Tek istediğimiz adalettir Bunu böyle belleyesin
english: All we want is justice That's how you know it
It is not for any of you to judge me.
From this tent court you set up

text: adalet değil, Ertuğrul'un fitnelerinin galip geleceğini bilirim
english: I know that Ertugrul's trials will prevail, not justice.

text: Ne bu mahkemeyi ne de bu mahkemenin vereceği kararı tanımayacağım
english: I will not recognize this court or this court's decision.

text: Mahkeme başlayacaktır. Söyleyeceğin varsa yargılanırken söylersin
english: If you have something to say, say it while you're on trial.

text: Hiç kimsenin huzurunda diz çökmem ben
Ol deyince olduran, gönüllerimizi imanla dolduran
english: The one who kills when he says, "Be," and fills our hearts with faith.

text: yüce Allah'ın doksan dokuz adıyla Bismillahirrahmanirrahim
english: In the name of Allah, the Most High, the Most Great, the Most Merciful, the Most Merciful,

text: Selcan'ın tek başına şifalı mantar toplamaya gittiğini
english: That Selcan alone went to get some herbs.

text: Peki, sonra ne oldu Hayme Hatun?
english: So, what happened next, Hayme Hatun?
Aytolun and Goncagül followed my brides

text: Yanıma Abdurrahman Alp'i alıp ben de peşlerinden gittim
english: I took Abdurrahman Alp with me and went after them.

text: Gelinlerimi öldürmeye teşebbüs ederken buldum onları
english: I found them attempting to kill my daughters-in-law.
My brother and my daughter are innocent.

text: Ben de Aytolun'u öldürtmek zorunda kaldım
english: So I had to kill Aytolun.

text: Ya sen Selcan Hatun, Goncagül Hatun'u kaçarken takip ettiğini söyledin
english: And you, Selcan Hatun, said you followed Goncagül Hatun on the run.

text: Onu yakaladım. Hançeriyle beni öldürmek istedi. Ben de kendimi korudum
english: I caught him, he tried to kill me with his dagger, so I defended myself.

text: Lakin sonra elimden kaçtı Söyleyeceklerim bundan ibarettir
english: But that's all I've got to say.
Mr. Silver's men and Mr. Ertugrul

text: ve Banı Çiçek'i yakaladığında ne oldu? Bir de senden dinlemek isterim
english: I'd like to hear from you.

text: Ertuğrul Bey'le Tuğtekin Bey'in de anlattığı gibi her şeyi inkâr etti
english: As Ertugrul Bey and Tuğtekin Bey said, he denied everything.

text: Lakin biz adalet istediğimiz için onu obaya
english: But since we want justice, let's put him in the room.
We've brought you to the gentlemen's court of appreciation.

text: Bir diyeceğin var mı Gümüştekin Bey?
english: Do you have anything to say, Mr. Silver?
All of you, get in trouble.
You're gonna pay for this. You're gonna pay for this.

text: Senin bir diyeceğin var mı Ertuğrul Bey?
english: Do you have anything to say, Mr. Ertugrul?
I wish I'd killed him sooner.

text: Bu işin bir ucu da başka kimselere gider Artuk Bey
english: One end of this goes to someone else, Mr. Artuk.

text: Gümüştekin Bey'in suçu sabittir Mahkemenin huzurunda
english: Mr. Silver's crime is stable before the court.

text: Saadettin Köpek'ten güç alarak cinayetlerini işlediğini
english: You've done your killings by taking strength from the Dog.

text: itiraf etmesi için bir fırsat daha verilmesini isterim sizden
english: I'd like to ask you to give him another chance to confess.

text: Devletimizi içeriden çürüten bir haini ifşa ederek
english: By exposing a traitor who rotted inside our government.

text: ölmeden önce hayırlı bir iş yapmış olur
english: He'll be doing a good job before he dies.

text: Doğru mu bu Gümüştekin? İtiraf edecek misin?

english: I will not yield to your lies, Ertugrul.
I'm not gonna bend, not just you.

text: senin yalanlarına ortak olan bütün bu beyler
english: All these gentlemen who share your lies.

text: Emir Saadettin sana kanan bütün bu ahmaklardan da bunun hesabını soracak
english: Emir Saadetti's gonna pay for this from all these fools who've been bleeding on you.
I have no fear of any of you.
You're gonna pay for this. You're gonna pay for this.

text: Konur Alp oğlu Gümüştekin, tanıkların beyanlarından yola çıkılarak
english: Speaking from the testimony of the witnesses, of Silver the son of Alp,
Your crime has been seen to be stable.

text: Aytolun Hatun ve Goncagül Hatun'la bir olup
english: With Aytolun Hatun and Goncagül Hatun
You've been proven to have committed these murders.

text: Tuğtekin Bey, senin infaz için bir diyeceğin var mıdır?
english: Mr. Tugtekin, do you have anything to say for the execution?
It's your right to pay for it.

text: İnfazın Ertuğrul Bey tarafından yapılmasını isterim
english: I'd like to be executed by Mr. Ertugrul

text: İki obanın da şerefini o kurtarmıştır
english: He saved the honor of both obans.
I'd like to see your eyes when you die.

text: Alpler, suçluyu infaz için otağın önüne götürün
english: Alps, take the culprit to the front of the tent for execution.
Don't believe these lies Don't believe them
Don't let Ertugrul's slanders get in the way

text: Aytolun Hatun da kızım da masumdurlar
english: Aytolun Hatun and my daughter are innocent.
They're in the blood of the innocent They killed my brother

text: Emir Saadettin bunların hepsinin hesabını sizlerden soracak
english: Amir Saadetti will answer to you for all of this.
♪ I'm the brains of the sky ♪

text: Uç beyini öldürenlerin hepsinden hesap sorulacaktır
english: Anyone who kills the extreme brain will be questioned.
You'll all go to the government's gadrine.

text: Sen Allah katında vereceğin hesabı düşün Gümüştekin Bey
english: Consider your reckoning in the sight of God, Mr. Silver.
In the name of our Sultan Alaeddin Keykabat, I command you.

text: Uç beyim hakkındaki asılsız iddiaları öğrenmek
english: To learn false claims about Master Fly

text: ve gerçeği açığa çıkartmak için geldim buraya
english: And I'm here to expose the truth.

text: İki obanın beyleri senin uç beyini değil
english: The gentlemen of the two obans are not your extreme brain.

text: Korkut Bey ve Duru Hatun'un katilini yargıladılar
english: Mr. Scare and Duru Hatun's killer are on trial

text: Aytolun'un ve Goncagül'ün, Korkut Bey'i ve karısı Duru Hatun'u öldürdüklerini
english: That Aytolun and Goncagül killed Mr. Kork and his wife, Duru Hatun

text: kulaklarımla işittim Bu olaya tanıklık ederim
english: I've heard it with my ears. I'll witness it.
He used his brother and daughter.

text: Cinayetleri uç beyi olmak için işledi
english: He committed the murders to become a flymaster.

text: Kayıları ve Dodurgaları kendi emellerine alet etmek için kullandı
english: He used the apricots and the Dodurga to use them for his own purposes.
Do you have proof, Mr. Ertugrul?

text: Ben de tanıklık ederim Emir Saadettin

english: It's a lie. lt's all a lie.

text: Hayme Hatun'u da Tuğtekin Bey'i de yalanlarıyla zehirledi
english: He poisoned Hayme Hatun and Tuğtekin Bey with his lies.

text: Şimdi Ertuğrul'u da Gümüştekin'i de alıp kervansaraya götüreceğim
english: Now I'll take Ertugrul and Silverkin to the caravan.

text: Gerçeği ortaya çıkarmak benim boynumun borcu olsun
english: It's my duty to find out the truth.

text: Aksi takdirde her iki obanın da beyleri
benim gözümde devlete isyan etmiş demektir
english: In my eyes, he has rebelled against the government.

text: Eh ben de gereğini yapmakta tereddüt etmem
english: Well, I don't hesitate to do what's necessary.

text: Kendi kuyunu kazdın Ertuğrul Kendi kuyunu kazdın
english: You've dug your own well, Ertugrul. You've dug your own well.

text: Yusuf'un yolunda kuyuda ölmekten korkmayız Elhamdülillah
english: We are not afraid to die in the well in Joseph's way, Alhamdulillah.
I'm telling you this once, Ertugrul.
Now you can take the brain if you want

text: Sanma ki bunun hesabını vermeyeceksin Ertuğrul
english: Don't think you won't pay for this, Ertugrul.

text: Bundan gayrı devlet düşmanına ne reva görülüyorsa
english: No matter what happens to the enemy of the state
That will happen to you, too.
Fear the wrath of the state
When you enter your separate tents, the peace
When you lie on your bed, you'll forget sleep.
Those who forget to obey the government's orders
This is Ertugrül who swears to the scoundrel.

text: gözlerinizde hiçbir vakit görmediğim korkuyu gördüm
english: I've seen the fear in your eyes that I've never seen.

text: Hiçbir felakette, hiçbir cenkte görmediğim korkuyu
english: The fear I've never seen in any disaster, in any battle.

text: Bu korku bin yıllık devlet sevginizden
english: This fear is from a thousand years of government love.

text: Emir-ül Emir'e itaatten gelir bunu bilirim
english: I know it comes from obedience to the Emir.
Don't be afraid of this manuscript.

text: Çünkü siz her daim devletinizin yanında oldunuz
english: Because you've always been on the side of your government.

text: Her daim de olmaya devam edeceksiniz
Devletin içine pusu kuran iblislerden korkmak değil
english: It's not fear of demons lurking inside the government.

text: onların karşısında adaletle durmak bize farz kılınmıştır
english: It is prescribed for Us to deal justly with them.

text: bu uğursuz katillerin bizlerden aldıkları canlar için yas tutun
english: Grieve for the lives these evil killers have taken from us.
May their place be in heaven
We didn't let go of the piety.
God is Well Aware of what we do.

text: Çok yaşa Ertuğrul Bey'im Çok yaşa Ertuğrul Bey'im
english: Long live Mr. Ertugrul. Long live Mr. Ertugrul.

text: Çok yaşa Ertuğrul Bey'im Çok yaşa Ertuğrul Bey'im
english: Long live Mr. Ertugrul. Long live Mr. Ertugrul.

text: Çok yaşa Ertuğrul Bey'im Çok yaşa Ertuğrul Bey'im
english: Long live Mr. Ertugrul. Long live Mr. Ertugrul.

text: Çok yaşa Ertuğrul Bey'im Çok yaşa Ertuğrul Bey'im
english: Long live Mr. Ertugrul. Long live Mr. Ertugrul.

text: Çok yaşa Ertuğrul Bey'im Çok yaşa Ertuğrul Bey'im
english: Long live Mr. Ertugrul. Long live Mr. Ertugrul.

text: Çok yaşa Ertuğrul Bey'im Çok yaşa Ertuğrul Bey'im
english: Long live Mr. Ertugrul. Long live Mr. Ertugrul.

text: Çok yaşa Ertuğrul Bey'im Çok yaşa Ertuğrul Bey'im
english: Long live Mr. Ertugrul. Long live Mr. Ertugrul.

text: Çok yaşa Ertuğrul Bey'im Çok yaşa Ertuğrul Bey'im
english: Long live Mr. Ertugrul. Long live Mr. Ertugrul.

text: Çok yaşa Ertuğrul Bey'im Çok yaşa Ertuğrul Bey'im
english: Long live Mr. Ertugrul. Long live Mr. Ertugrul.

text: Çok yaşa Ertuğrul Bey'im Çok yaşa Ertuğrul Bey'im
english: Long live Mr. Ertugrul. Long live Mr. Ertugrul.

text: Çok yaşa Ertuğrul Bey'im Çok yaşa Ertuğrul Bey'im
english: Long live Mr. Ertugrul. Long live Mr. Ertugrul.
Does he still have a fever?
You'll have to excuse us, Selcan Hatun.

text: Merak etmeyesin. Artuk Bey gereğini yapacaktır Selcan Hatun
english: Don't worry, Mr. Aruk will take care of it Selcan Hatun.

text: Derine girip irini iyice çıkartacağım beyim
english: I'm going to go deep and get the pus out of you, sir.
It's gonna hurt my Mr. Gündüz.

text: Çok yaşa Ertuğrul Bey'im Çok yaşa Ertuğrul Bey'im
english: Long live Mr. Ertugrul. Long live Mr. Ertugrul.

text: Emir Saadettin'in itibarını iki paralık ettin beyim. Rahat durmayacaktır
english: You've ruined Emir Saadettin's reputation, sir.

text: Saadettin Köpek iki obanın da peşine düşmeyecektir
english: The dog won't go after either of the obans.

text: İtibarını korumak için tedbirler alacağı belli
english: It's obvious he'll take precautions to protect his reputation.

text: Bu olayın üstünü örtecektir. Obalarımızı değil beni düşman belleyecektir
english: He'll cover it up, he'll think I'm the enemy, not our Obas.

text: Senin istediğin de buydu zaten beyim
O da tıpkı Gümüştekin gibi tuzak kurdukça batacaktır
english: He'll sink as long as he's trapped, just like the silver one.

text: Beyim, yalnız bilmeni isterim ki gayrı Gündoğdu Bey'imin başalpliği bitmiştir
english: Sir, I just want you to know that Mr. Gündüz is finished.
What do you think, Mr. Artuk?

text: Obalarımızın selameti için gereğini yapmak mecburiyetindeyiz
english: We must do what is necessary for the welfare of our Obas.

text: Ben vakti zamanı gelince Hayme Hatun'a anlatacaktım
english: I was going to tell Hayme Hatun when the time came.
But I wanted you to know first.
Lord, know that you won't be alone.
Thank you, Mr. Artuk. Thank you.

text: Abla, abla, abla, sakin olasın abla
english: Sis, sis, sis, calm down, sis.
In silver, my lord, by oath...
I'm not gonna put you with the people who did this.

text: Gözün arkada kalmasın beyim İntikamınızı alana dek…
english: Don't worry, sir, until you get your revenge...

text: …ne bu obaya ne de Ertuğrul ve sevdiklerine rahat yüzü göstereceğim
english: I'm not going to give this oba or Ertugrul and his loved ones any comfort.

text: Goncagül’ün peşinden giden Alpler geri döndü
english: The Alps that went after Goncagül have returned
There's no escape for him. He's bound to be found.
The Alps will continue to search

text: Hayme Ana, o avrat nefes aldığı sürece benim içim rahat etmeyecektir
english: Mother Hayme, as long as she's breathing, I won't rest.

text: Turalı yarın Alpliğe ilk adımını atacak
english: Headsy's taking his first step into the Alps tomorrow.

text: Sünnet olacak Ee, Alp pusatsız olur mu hiç?
english: There's gonna be circumcision. Well, how can you be without the Alpine stroller?
...he was going to make the first push of the Turk.

text: Şimdi bu görev bana düşer beyim
english: Now it's up to me, sir.

Hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey! hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey,
I pity the enemy who will be the reaper

text: Senin gibi yiğidin elinde haksızlığın sesi olsun…
english: Let a man like you have the voice of injustice...
I hope he has a hard time.
The pusats he made spread death on the shroud.

text: İyi o hâl Turgut Bakalım Deli Demir bize neler öğretmiş
english: Well, let's see what Turgut Crazy Iron taught us.
Thank you, sir. Let's get started.
▪ A mountain of steel so wide that the sun can't move
The moon cannot roam the golden mountain
The great tree does not cut through the honey.
The blessed father-in-law with the leaves
The owner of the fiery fire is a white publication.
My water with a thousand ears
The man with the ice foot is the man.

text: Cenk edip dolaştığımız nice kan aldığımız…
english: We've taken a lot of blood that we've been walking around with.

text: …nice kan döktüğümüz bu topraklar kutumuz olsun
english: ...the land where we shed blood is our box.

text: Hanlar Hanı Cengiz Han’ın yolundan giden yiğit nökerlerim…
english: I'm the brave ones who follow the path of Genghis Khan of Khans...
...we came to this land for revenge.

text: Han için kanımız sana feda olsun!
english: May our blood be on you for the Khan!
You've come to the end of the line, my poets.

text: …yokluğunuzla çöl rüzgârları gibi savrulur Emir Saadettin
english: ...as the desert winds blow away in your absence. You've done your bidding.

text: Siz bir bahri ummansınız Sizin himmetinizle biz şair kullarınıza da…
english: You are indeed the best of those who believe in Allah and His Noble Messengers.

text: …bahri ummanda bir damla olmak nasip olur
english: ...to be a drop in the marine hope.

text: …tebaanız hile ve desise mi yaparlar da…
Biliriz ki adaletinizin kılıcından nasiplerini alacaklardır
english: We know they'll get their share from the sword of your justice.
That's where your greatness comes from.
Justice is what comes with vengeance.
Justice is the shadow of vengeance

text: ölümle yüz yüze yaşamak hiç değil
english: To live face to face with death is not at all
Give him the credit for his vengeance.

text: "İntikam en tatlı aşığın nefesi kadar sıcak"
english: "Revenge is as hot as the breath of the sweetest lover"

text: "Evladın omzuna başını koyması kadar masum intikam"
english: "As innocent revenge as the child puts his head on his shoulder."

text: Daha önce hiç duymamıştım böyle muhteşem dizeleri
english: I've never heard such wonderful lines

text: Kim bu büyük şair Emir Hazretleri?
english: Who is this great poet, Your Highness?
Come on, eat. Don't cool your food.
Thank God your fever's gone, sir.
I hope you'll be all right.

text: Ertuğrul Bey’im kellesini obanın ortasında savurdu
english: Ertuğrul Bey threw his head in the middle of the oban

Hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey! hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey,
It's dawn, I've got something to tell you

text: Bunca acının üstüne rabbimin nasip ettiği bu evlat…
english: On top of all this pain, this son of my Lord...

text: …büyüyüp sana yaraşır bir yiğit olacak, bilirim
english: I know he'll grow up to be a man worthy of you.

text: Asıl senin gibi bir anaya yakışır evlat olacak
english: He'll be the son of a mother like you.

text: Derdimin dermanı sende ne arar kardeş?
Benim derdim gönül meselesidir dövülecek ayı meselesi değil
english: My problem is a matter of heart, not a matter of the bear to be beaten.

text: Yahu kardeş, öyle kestirip atmayasın hemen Biz ilim ehliyizdir
english: Brother, don't let it slip away. We're scholars.

text: Ne diyorsun kardeş ya? Ne ilimi, ne ehli?
english: What are you talking about, brother?
Brother, you tell me, you tell me.

text: Banı Çiçek’e hatunum olur musun diyeceğim
english: I'll tell Mr. Flower if you'll be my girl.
I don't know how to say it.

text: Kardeş, ben de devlet kurup devlet yıkacaksın sandıydım
english: Brother, I thought you were going to build a state and destroy a state.
I'm sorry, bro, you know what?
Look, I'm gonna tell you one last time.

text: Gönlüm alev aldı, intizarın beni yaktı kavurdu
english: My heart caught fire, your attacker burned me
Oh, that heart of mine is on fire...
Your suicide burned me to the ground.
You're gonna go on and on and on and on and you're gonna say...

text: …bakışların bir ok gibi gönlümü delip geçti
english: Your gaze has pierced my heart like an arrow.

text: Güzelliğin bir kuyu, ben içine düşerim Yusuf misali
english: Your beauty is a well, I fall into it like Joseph

text: Issız bir çölde kuru bir yaprak gibiyim
english: I'm like a dry leaf in a desert

text: Kardeş, sen bunları nereden biliyorsun ya?
english: Brother, how do you know all this?
And like your brother with the deer said...
...not the one who tells you, but the one who tells you.

text: Bu şifayı yaraya iyice süreceksin Banı Çiçek Hatun
english: You're going to put this healing into the wound.

text: Allah senden razı olsun Artuk Bey
Benim bakmam gereken hastalar vardır Sen dediklerimi yapasın
english: I've got patients to take care of. You do as I say.
Thank you. Born Alpine is fine.

text: Artık Bey’in verdiği şifayla daha iyi olacak inşallah
english: He'll be better off now with the healing of the Lord
The flower lady's heart has set me on fire

text: Nasıl bir göz varsa artık sende…

english: ...he pierced my heart like an ocean.

text: Sen bir çöl gibisin, ben de sende kayboldum
english: You're like a desert, and I'm lost.
What do you think, Born Alpine?

text: Vallahi ben de bilmiyorum ki ne diyorum
english: I don't know what I'm talking about.

text: Ben böyle lafları bilmem Çiçek Hatun
english: I don't know that kind of language, Flower Chick.
I want you to be my girl.
I'd like you to accept me as a private.

text: …o halde canına can gönlüne derman olurum
Bundan gayrı senin çadırın benim sarayım…
english: Other than that, your tent is my palace...
Your life will be my paradise.
Your sorrows will be my joy and my spring
My life will be your life

text: Sen şimdi bana hatunum olur musun dedim diye he dedin değil mi?
english: You just said you'd be my girl, didn't you?

text: …ben, hatunum olur musun dedim sen he dedin yani?
english: I said, "Will you be my girl?" You said, "Yeah"?

text: He dedin, hatunum olacaksın? Evet, Doğan Alp
english: You said you'd be my girl?

text: O vakit ben gidip beyime diyeyim böyle böyle diye
english: Then I'll go and tell my master so.

text: Ki benim Ertuğrul Bey’im gelip seni Tuğtekin Bey’inden istesin o vakit
english: That my Ertugrul Bey will come and ask for you from Tuğtekin Bey.
Mr. Artuk said you should rest.

text: Acıkınca da tekmeleri pek bir sert oluyor
english: And when he's hungry, his kicks are hard.

text: Hem böyle hayırlı bir günde sizinle birlikte olmak isterim
english: Besides, I'd like to be with you on a good day like this.

text: Ertuğrul Bey’im, Doğan Alp sizi görmek ister
english: Ertuğrul Beyim, Doğan Alpine wants to see you.

text: Bir haller olmuş belli ki Yerinde duramaz
english: There's been a situation where it can't be stopped.

text: Beyim, müsaadenle bir dileğim olacak senden
english: Sir, if you'll excuse me, I have a request for you.

text: De hele Doğan, nedir bu halin?

english: You're the answer to my problem, my lord.
You know, me and Bani Flower...

text: Ne vakit isteyelim Tuğtekin Bey’imizden Banı Çiçek Hatun'u?
english: When should we ask for Bani Flower Hatun from Tuğtekin Bey?

text: Hayme Ana’mla sen ne vakit dilersen beyim
english: Whenever you and Hayme Ana wish, sir.
We'll ask Tuğtekin Bey for tomorrow night

text: Bahara da iki aşığın kavuşmasıyla gireriz
english: We'll enter the spring with two lovers.
(Alphabets of the Arabic language - Allah, and to whomever He reveals, know their precise meanings.)
Thank God the Oba is free of traitors.

text: Bundan gayrı hey şey güzel olacak
english: Other than that, hey, it's gonna be nice.

text: Artuk Bey beni tez vakitte sünnet edecek ve bana ilk pusatımı verecek
english: Mr. Artuk will soon have me circumcised and give me my first straw.
The lion's piece is blessed Mashallah, a very good one.

text: Yahu kardeşler bu huzur güzel şeymiş vallahi
english: Sisters, this peace is a beautiful thing.

text: Ben de bundan gayrı tahsilime daha fazla devam edeceğim
english: I'm going to continue my education further than that.

text: Söyle bakalım, yok mudur bize nasihatlerin?
english: Tell me, don't you have any advice for us?
We'd like to take advantage of your knowledge.

text: Kardeş, ilim ehline yakışan anlatarak değil…
english: Brother, it's not like a scholar's tale...

text: Bamsı Alp, biz garip dervişlerin duygusuna tercüman olmuştur
english: Bamsik Alp has been able to translate into the feeling of us strange dervishes.
Brother, truth is hard to swallow

text: Hakikate talip olan kişinin beti benzi soluktur
english: The person who seeks the truth is pale

text: İlim ehli için safa az, cefa boldur kardeşim
english: For the people of knowledge there is little and much suffering, my brother.

text: Ben de Bamsı neden böyle bir deri bir kemik kaldı derim
english: I'll tell you why Bamsu's so skinny.
Oh, my gosh, that's what this is about.

text: Bu tahsil hayatı beni zafiyete düşürmüştür
english: This collection life has left me weak.
There's a brother, there's a brother

text: Merak etmeyesin sana koca bir kuzu keseceğim
english: Don't worry. I'll cut you a big lamb.

text: Bamsı Alp’im, sen neden ilim öğrenmek istersin?
english: Why do you want to learn science?
Brother, God has taken care of us.
It is He who has sent down to us the Qur'an.
Now, if I don't read it...

text: Banı Çiçek hatunum olmayı kabul etti kardeşler
english: The brothers agreed to be my flower girl.

text: Yarın Hayme Ana ile Ertuğrul Bey’im gidip Tuğtekin Bey’den isteyecekler
english: Tomorrow, Mother Hayme and Mr. Ertugrul will go and ask Mr. Tuğtekin
In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.

text: Anamın aşından yemeyen şifa bulamaz dediler…
english: They said anyone who doesn't eat from my mother's vaccine can't find a cure.

text: …Sungur kardeşim iyi bilir, biz de kalktık geldik
english: ...Sungur knows my brother, so we're up and about.

text: Kızım, hoş geldin Hoş bulduk ana

english: Here you go. Thank you, brother.
Do you have a sign, Hayme Ana?

text: Hayme Ana, Dündar Bey’im ve Yiğit Alp’ten haber getirdi bir ulak
english: Hayme Ana, Dündar Beyim and Hero Alpine have brought news of a messenger

text: Kısmetse birkaç güne kadar burada olacaklarmış
english: Hopefully they'll be here in a few days.
I'll sit at the table with my boys.

text: Göç vakti geldiğinde evlatlarımın yanımda olduğunu bilmek var ya…
english: You know, when it's time to emigrate, knowing that I have my sons with me...
I'm not afraid of anything else.

text: Damarlarımızdaki kanı kurutan ihanet de bitmiştir gayrı
english: The betrayal that dried the blood out of our veins is over.

text: Bu bahar bize huzur ve adalet getirsin inşallah
english: May this spring bring us peace and justice

text: Gayrı aramızda bir sır kalsın istemem
english: I don't want to keep a secret between us.

text: Her sır dönüp dolaşıp dağlanmış yaralarımızı daha da kanatır
english: Every secret turns around and makes our cauterized wounds bleed even more.
What other secrets do you have, Gökçe?
He'd curse the obama like in silver.

text: Ölümle cebelleşirken bu adam onu öldürmeye geldi
english: While he was struggling with death, this man came to kill him.
Ertugrul Bey wanted to protect my...
...he hurt me badly with his dagger.
I'm afraid she'll take my womanhood, sir.
I can't give you a son

text: Tüccar Abdullah, Tebriz’den gelmiş Size mühim haberleri varmış
english: Trader Abdullah came from Tebriz. He has important news for you.

text: Al onu içeriye Ama üstünü iyice ara
english: Take him in, but search him thoroughly.

text: Üzerinde pusat namına tek şey bırakma. Hadi
english: Don't leave anything on it in the name of pusat.

text: Bu kadar tedbire gerek yoktu Saadettin
english: You didn't have to be so careful.

text: Geçmişte bana ettiklerini Amuderya’nın kutlu suyuna atıp öyle geldim
english: I just threw what you've done to me in the holy water of Amuderia.
I heard the item threw you out of his army.

text: Yetmemiş, bir de başına ödül koymuş
english: It's not enough, he's got a bounty on his head.
...take the head of the dog you trust so much...
I've heard that you've destroyed your reputation.
Aren't you afraid I'll kill you?

text: Bugüne kadar bana yazdığın bütün mektuplar elimde
english: I've got every letter you've ever written me.

text: O mektupları sultanın görürse ne olur dersin?
english: What do you think will happen if the sultan sees those letters?

text: Tek başına yapacaksın ha o işi?
english: You're gonna do it on your own, huh?

text: Duydum. Ögeday’ın ordusundan attığı birkaç çapulcuyla gezermişsin
english: I heard you've been traveling with a few marauders who've been thrown out of the army.

text: Adamlarım Moğol ordusunun en acımasız katilleri
english: My men are the most ruthless assassins in the Mongol army.
I trust you most of all.
What's going on in that head of yours, Noyan?
My men want spoils, they want spoils

text: Sen de bu topraklarda huzurun bozulmasını istemezsin
english: And you don't want to ruin the peace in this land.

text: Ne adamlarımın ganimet için obalara saldırmasını istersin…
english: You don't want my men attacking the obas for the loot...

text: …ne de Ertuğrul için gönderdiğin askerler yüzünden…
english: Not because of the soldiers you sent for Ertuğrul.
...you want the recordings and the Dodurga to revolt.

text: Ertuğrul’la yarım kalan hesabımı bitirmek isterim Emir Hazretleri
english: I'd like to finish my unfinished business with Ertugrul.
Your men are not for gold...

text: Yeter ki sen bana Ertuğrul’un kellesini getir
english: As long as you bring me Ertugrul's head.

text: Bana düşen de iki obanın senin yüzünden birleşen yollarını kesmektir
english: And it's up to me to cut off the two obans that are united because of you.
I'm gonna come down on them like a nightmare.

text: Yaşadıkları her gün onlara azap olacak
english: Every day they will be punished.

text: Sizi görmek isteyen bir hanım var
english: There's a lady here to see you.

text: Adının Goncagül olduğunu söyler Emir Hazretleri
english: He says his name is Goncagül, Your Highness.
You have something to talk about.

text: …sana bu altınlardan çok daha kıymetli bir hediye vereceğim Noyan
english: I'll give you something far more precious than this gold, Noyan.

text: Halam ve babamın intikamını almak isterim Emir Hazretleri
english: I'd like to avenge my aunt and father's death, Your Highness.

text: Gayrı sizden başka kimsem yoktur artık
english: I don't have anyone but you anymore.
I'm at your service for the rest of my life.

text: Saadettin Köpek bundan gayrı bize daha çok musallat olacaktır
english: The dog will haunt us even more than that.

text: …önümüzdeki bahara kadar Dodurgalılarla birliğimize devam edelim
english: ...let's continue our union with the Dodrigans until the next spring.

text: Selcan Hatun ile Halime Hatun marifetlerini gösterir, kilimlerimizi satarız
english: We'll show Selcan Hatun and Halima Hatun, sell our rugs.

text: Alp olma yaşına gelmiş yiğitlerimiz var, onları yetiştiririz
english: We've got brave men of the age of the Alps, we'll raise them.
And when it's springtime, we're gone.

text: Derim ki bunu da en kısa vakitte toyda istişare edelim
english: I say we discuss this as soon as possible.

text: Ana, bu göç vakti geldiğinde senin aklında bir yer var mıdır göçmek için?
english: Ana, when it's time for this migration, do you have a place in mind to migrate?

text: Ama tez vakitte beylerimle oturup bu meseleyi istişare etmek isterim
english: But soon I'd like to sit down with my gentlemen and discuss this matter.

text: Ertuğrul kardeşim, senin aklında bir yer var mı?
english: Brother Ertugrul, do you have a place in mind?
With those who sit at this table...

text: …Kayı’nın köklerinin salınacağı topraklara gitmek isterim ağabey
english: I'd like to go to the land where the roots of the record will be released, brother.
That our sons and daughters can read Fatihe behind our backs...

text: İnşallah o yere hep birlikte karar vereceğiz
english: Let's hope we all decide that place together.

text: Ne güzel dedin kardeşim İnşallah, inşallah
english: That's a nice thing to say, brother. I hope so.

text: Hayme Ana’m, müsaaden olursa size birkaç şey söylemek isterim
english: Hayme Ana, if you don't mind, I'd like to say a few words.

text: Obamız ne vakit nereye gider bilmem
english: I don't know when our Oba goes where.

text: Lakin gittiğimiz topraklara sımsıkı tutunalım isterim
english: But I want us to hold on to the land we're going to.
...and we can raise our babies in our own home.

text: İnşallah bu sefer kucağına bebemizi vereceğim
english: I hope this time I'll give you our baby.

text: Ölmeden bütün evlatlarımla bir arada olmayı nasip ettin
english: You've allowed me to be with all my sons before I die.
♪ Our burden is heavy, our work is hard ♪
Our strength depends on a thin hair
That it may be beneficial for him in the way of truth.
Let the light of the record shine
...lit by the lonely in the darkness.

text: Gücümüzü, kuvvetimizi, aklımızı, kelamımızı eğriden uzak tutsun
english: Keep our strength, our strength, our minds, our words away from the curve
Let him protect us from the evil of doing what is right and wrong.
Let him not separate us from our religion, from our tradition.
Don't let him forget where we come from and where we go.

text: Bizleri Atam Oğuz’un kutlu yolundan ayrı koymasın
english: Let him not separate us from the holy way of Oğuz.
God, don't separate us from each other.
Big hair, alive hair, for God's sake.

text: Sen bizi birbirimize sevgiyle, muhabbetle bağla yarabbim
english: You connect us with each other with love and conversation, for God's sake.
